// This testbench illustrates how to create a testbench for a simple pipeline
// without an enable. It also demonstrates subtle timing differences when
// functions are used within assertion properties.
// TODO: Change the commented out assertion properties to test each version.
// To solve the problem with the previous function, we simply add a parameter
// to the function that takes the output from the assertion property, which
// ensures that the output has not been changed yet after the clock edge.
function automatic logic is_out_correct2(logic [WIDTH-1:0] in[8], logic [WIDTH-1:0] out);
// Make sure the valid output is not asserted after reset until the pipeline
// Make sure valid out is asserted correctly after the pipeline is full.

column1: p1: assert property  (@(posedge clk) s_eventually rst == 1 || disp_ena == 1);
assert property (@(posedge clk) disable iff (rst) s_eventually (rst == 1 || disp_ena == 1));

In this version the clocking part is @(posedge clk), the reset disable condition is disable iff (rst), and the timed logical expression is s_eventually (rst == 1 || disp_ena == 1). (Remember that the disable iff clause is optional; if omitted, the clocking portion and the logical expression would remain.)",https://github.com/diffblue/hw-cbmc/blob/main/examples/Benchmarks/vga_1.sv

endmodule","Below is one acceptable transformation of the eight assertions into the requested format. In each case the clock and reset (disable iff) portions are explicitly included, and the original logic is preserved. The output is strictly as follows:
assert property(@(posedge clk) disable iff (rst) (state == 1 & req2 == 1) |-> (gnt1 == 0));
assert property(@(posedge clk) disable iff (rst) (req1 == 1 & state == 0) |-> (gnt1 == 1));
assert property(@(posedge clk) disable iff (rst) (req1 == 1 & req2 == 0) |-> (gnt1 == 1));
assert property(@(posedge clk) disable iff (rst) (req1 == 1 & state == 0) |-> (gnt2 == 0));
assert property(@(posedge clk) disable iff (rst) (req2 == 1 & state == 1) |-> (gnt2 == 1));
assert property(@(posedge clk) disable iff (rst) (req2 == 1 & req1 == 0) |-> (gnt2 == 1));",https://github.com/achieve-lab/assertion_data_for_LLM/tree/NIPS_2024/Jasper_results/Arbiter
